descriptionHtml:
[WIP] An extra part to BreezleHome
I\'m going to add alot of stuff to it. Like storage place, dungeons (with monsters and treasure ofc.), acces points and much more :D

At the moment its just a room with some stuff and a GIANT frost troll as a guard for you :D
If it attacks you...  KILL IT WITH FIRE!!!

UPDATE 0.3
- Added Necromance Boss Room
- Added Necromance Boss and minions
- Added 2 BOSS chests
- Added Trapdoor to Necromance Boss
- Fixed some bugs
- Added some bugs

UPDATE 0.2
- New Room
- Changed Doors
- Added Giant Frost Troll Guard
- Added 2 Chest
- Added 1 Noble Double Bed
- Added 1 Noble Chest
- Added  6 Mannequin (not working atm)
- Added Enchantment Workbench
- Added Smelter
- Added Cooking Firespit
- Added Sharpening Wheel
- Added Forge
- Added Alchemy Workbench
- Added Throne

INSTALLATION:
Just add it to NMM and it will do your work or add it to your Skyrim/date file
author: Aras
